title: Why I still  use the legacy client
body: I hate the fact that Riot is getting rid of the only way I can get a good experience with the game by totally removing the Legacy client.  I wish they didn't cause when I use the New one, my PC slows to a crawl and I can't get into any matches cause its saying I didn't reply fast enough when I did.

replies.body: The [updated client ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)has a toggle option to a low-performance mode.  Per our[ new update on testing](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/client-beta-update-2-replacing-legacy-client-1), that mode is expected to get more buffs too.  Try out that mode to see if it helps, and offer any feedback you have to the client devs through the client discussion boards.  Thanks for testing!
